title: Breakfast on the Go
description: Have a lot to do? Book our Breakfast on the Go Package and receive a $10.00 Pret A Manger card per person at our best available rates. This promotion applies to reservations made exclusively on our website and cannot be combined with any other discounts or promotions. Details: Valid for stays until September 21, 2017. One (1) $10 dollar Pret A Manger card per night single occupancy, two (2) $10 dollar Pret A Manger cards per night double occupancy. Maximum number of Pret A Manger cards per room per night, two (2) $10 cards based on double occupancy. Offer does not apply to groups of 5 or more rooms. Offer cannot be combined with any other discounts or promotions. Blackout dates may apply. Based upon availability.
